name: TwitchPlayer
body:
### Installation:

Windows application: [URL](https://github.com/TwitchPlayer/TwitchPlayer/releases).
It requires livestreamer installed: [URL](http://docs.livestreamer.io/install.html#windows-binaries). 
And Chrome externtion: .

Now, you are ready to watch your favorire streams using VLC without lags. You just need to right-click stream link and choose "Watch in VLC"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
